title: Teen asylum seekers from Afghanistan sentenced for rape
description: A judge has lifted reporting restrictions on naming the attackers, Jan Jahanzeb and Israr Niaza.
content:

title: US student guilty of murdering Chinese partner after row over STDs
description: Joshua Michals, 26, fatally stabbed Zhe Wang, 31, at her flat in Lewisham last year after she accused him of passing on an STD. Both studied at Goldsmiths University and had been in an on-and-off relationship since 2023.
content:
An American student has been found guilty of murdering a Chinese woman after she accused him of passing on a sexually transmitted disease (STD).
Appearing at the Old Bailey, Joshua Michals, 26, was found to have fatally stabbed Zhe Wang, 31, at her f... [3013 chars]

title: Birmingham hospitals' 'critical' incident over flu admissions
description: University Hospitals Birmingham said 269 people with the flu currently require admission.
content:
A critical incident has been declared at four hospitals due to "exceptional" numbers of patients with flu.
University Hospitals Birmingham NHS Foundation Trust said "extreme" pressures were being experienced across its hospitals.
A spokesperson said ... [287 chars]

title: Two more arrests over Heathrow airport ‘pepper spray attack’
description: Man to be quizzed on suspicion of robbery and assault, and woman on suspicion of conspiracy to commit robbery, after 21 people hurt at Heathrow airport
content:
Police have arrested two more people following an assault suspected to have been with pepper spray and a robbery at Heathrow airport on Sunday.
On Monday afternoon, officers arrested a 24-year-old man in Lambeth, south London, on suspicion of robbery... [1001 chars]

title: American Goldsmiths student stabbed girlfriend to death in ‘savage’ attack ‘then called his father for a lawyer’
description: Joshua Michals, from Chicago in the US, and Chinese national Zhe Wang had an on-and-off relationship in London that ended in murder, a trial heard
content:
An American student at a London university has been convicted of stabbing his on-off girlfriend to death, in a “brutal and savage” attack.
Zhe Wang, a creative writing student at Goldsmiths, was found dead with two stab wounds to her face at her flat... [3815 chars]
